data.actual_result: You are indefinitely being redirected to the Discord Web App
data.expected_result: You are redirected to the new server and can use Discord in your browser
data.short_description: [Firefox] After typing out an invite in the address bar and accepting it, Discord loads indefinitely
data.steps_to_repro: - get your best friend to send you an invite to his super cool server you are not yet part of - copy and paste OR type out the invite into your firefox address bar - accept the invite and observe
